original_text: And it came to pass, when Moses went out unto the tabernacle, that all the people rose up, and stood every man at his tent door, and looked after Moses, until he was gone into the tabernacle.
korean_text: 모세가 회막으로 나아갈 때에는 백성이 다 일어나 자기 장막 문에 서서 모세가 회막에 들어가기까지 바라보며

sentences.original_text: when Moses went out unto the tabernacle
that all the people rose up
and stood every man at his tent door
sentences.korean_translation: 각 사람이 자기 장막 문에 서서

sentences.original_text: until he was gone into the tabernacle
